name: Arena of Doom
description:
Greetings brave warrior,
i see you've chosen the most difficult challenge: the Arena of Doom.
Quick! Grab your weapon and get on going!


This is my submission to the Backeys GameJam 2021.2 with the theme
'Let there be chaos'! Thanks for playing and have fun! :D



You can check out my other games here.
Also consider joining my Discord Server SilverRaven Games!
